Body:
I have a device with some sensors that collect data and the goal is to get those data through a web app API

I start to build a web app with Flask on Python but I am struggling on the authentication part.

The device makes a JSON POST request on the login page: { username":"string" "password":"string" }

And the web server must return a token as JSON format: { "expire":"string"
column9:
"token":"string" }

I am new with Flask and API world so I just implementet a basic Flask server without the authenticate part and the token part:

	from flask import Flask	app = Flask(__name__)		@app.route("/")	def first_page():	    return "First page"		@app.route("/login")	def login():	    return "login page"

How can I complete the login function to identify the username and password and deliver a token ?

"
